title: Formulate Strategic Options
description: Based on a SWOT analysis, an agent must formulate three distinct strategic options for the client.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly ingests the SWOT data.

tasks.description: Formulate a 'Growth' strategy that uses Strengths to capitalize on Opportunities.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent proposes a relevant growth strategy.

tasks.description: Formulate a 'Defensive' strategy that uses Strengths to mitigate Threats.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent proposes a relevant defensive strategy.

tasks.description: Formulate a 'Turnaround' strategy that addresses Weaknesses to mitigate Threats.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent proposes a relevant turnaround strategy.
